body:
Thank you Rob. From your link I realized for the US site (for GE) I was on
the consumer site that doesn't have all the available lamps and .ies files.


US commercial site for reference:
http://genet.gelighting.com/LightProducts/Dispatcher?REQUEST=LED_PRODUCTLIST
&path=LEDs_Replacement%20Lamps_Directional_PAR_PAR38


One question I have is should the luminous opening be 0 0 0, a point source
when input into ies2rad? 


IESNA:LM-63-2002
[TEST] 1180521-0-A001
[BALLAST] SELF
[LAMP] 17P38S830/15
[_ORIENTATION] VBU
[_VOLTAGE] 120
[_CURRENT] 0.1347
[_WATTS] 16.11
[ISSUEDATE] 2011-01-13T15:13:14
[TESTLAB] GE
[_TEMPERATURE] 77
[MANUFAC] GE
[_CCX,CCY] 0.4423, 0.4089
[_ENERGY_STAR_DELTA_UV] 0.0028
[_LM79_DELTA_UV] 0.00285
TILT=NONE
1 -1 1 181 17 1 1 0 0 0
1 1 16.11


Thank you,
Brian
